Package Entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entities.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mercenary, Monster
    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a parent class of all monsters and player. Contains information such as hp, mp, base armor, base damage and name of entity. This class doesn't have a constructor but it contains methods, that allow its child classes to set the values of this class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxHp

        public void setMaxHp​(int maxHp)
        This method is used to set the max hp of entity. It also sets the current hp to max hp. Used in monster and mercenary constructors.
        Parameters:
        maxHp - This is the the value used for setting hp.

      • setMaxMp

        public void setMaxMp​(int maxMp)
        This method is used to set the max mp of entity. It also sets the current mp to max mp. Used in monster and mercenary constructors.
        Parameters:
        maxMp - This is the the value used for setting mp.

      • setBasePhysDmg

        public void setBasePhysDmg​(int lowPhysDmg,
                           int highPhysDmg)
        This method is used to set the range of base physical damage of entity. Physical damage is lowered by receiver's armor. Physical damage is influenced by player strength. Used in monster and mercenary constructors.
        Parameters:
        lowPhysDmg - Lower bound of base physical damage.
        highPhysDmg - Higher bound of base physical damage.

      • setBasePiercDmg

        public void setBasePiercDmg​(int lowPiercDmg,
                            int highPiercDmg)
        This method is used to set the range of base piercing damage of entity. Piercing damage ignores receiver's armor. Piercing damage is influenced by player dexterity. Used in monster and mercenary constructors.
        Parameters:
        lowPiercDmg - Lower bound of base physical damage.
        highPiercDmg - Higher bound of base piercing damage.

      • setBaseArmor

        public void setBaseArmor​(int baseArmor)
        This method is used to set the base armor of entity. Armor reduces received physical damage. Used in monster and mercenary constructors.
        Parameters:
        baseArmor - Value used for setting base armor.

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        This method is used to set the name of entity. Used in monster and mercenary constructors.
        Parameters:
        name - String used for naming the entity.

      • setWeapon

        public void setWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
        This method is used to equip entity with weapon. For example it is used when buying weapon from forge.
        Parameters:
        weapon - Weapon that will be equipped.

      • setArmor

        public void setArmor​(Armor armor)
        This method is used to equip entity with armor. For example it is used when buying armor from forge.
        Parameters:
        armor - Armor that will be equipped.

      • healHp

        public void healHp​(int amount)
        This method is used to heal hp of entity. For example it is called by hp potion.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of hp to be healed.

      • healMp

        public void healMp​(int amount)
        This method is used to heal mp of entity. For example it is called by mp potion.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of mp to be healed.

      • attack

        public boolean attack​(Entity receiver)
        This method is used to make entity attack other entities. Uses damage handler for damage calculation. Attacker has a chance to miss attack and a chance to deal critical attack. If the attacker is mercenary, damage dealt is influenced by player stats. If the attacker is mercenary, weapon takes durability damage. IF the receiver is mercenary, armor takes durability damage.
        Parameters:
        receiver - Entity that receives damage.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if it is a critical attack was used and false it is a regular attack.
